title: Top 100 (best songs of 2022)
excerpt: A massive 6½-hour mixtape with 100 great songs out in 2022. A senseless, sketchy, and imperfect unordered selection by Spineless Laugh that surprisingly set up to be the hugest Best Of playlist of the year.

title: MixMag 2010-2019
excerpt: A time machine, a look from the 2020's pandemic to the past 10 years. 20 of the best techno tracks of the decade, selected by MixMag & mixed by Spineless Laugh in strict chronological order.

title: The Last Big Impezzo (white rain remix)
excerpt: A deep dive from original chaos to unfaithful calm and sharp melodies. Everything following a quite long path of noisy but tight kickdrum danceability.

title: Bad Aesthetics
excerpt: A hot cup full of dubstep, lust, and uncontrolled electronics driven off road by kicking and overwhelming emotions. A digital, detailed analysis of how shouldn't be so hard to have a nice day, and how actually is. Finally.

title: The Sun (numbers remix)
excerpt: You and me. The sun and an overwhelming rage looming. House beats, funky synths, 8-bit computer noises. Fractured voices, decomposed to be re-combined along multiple layers. Rising, then falling. Like the sun broken into cold numbers.

title: US2Know
excerpt: Have you ever had the experience of losing reference points through blurred memories and the now undefined shape of what you used to know? A trancestep dubtempo filled with tremolo synths, numbed beats, and pieces of word repeated as a ping-pong delayed mantra.

title: Top 90 (best songs of 2021)
excerpt: A massive nearly-6-hour mixtape with 90 great songs out in 2021. A senseless, sketchy, and imperfect unordered selection by Spineless Laugh that surprisingly set up to be the hugest Best Of playlist of the year.

title: Top 100 (best songs of 2020)
excerpt: A massive 6½-hour mixtape with 100 great songs out in 2020. A senseless, sketchy, and imperfect unordered selection by Spineless Laugh that surprisingly set up to be the hugest Best Of playlist of the year.
